Neuronal acetylcholine receptor subunit.DefiningCitation: Online Mendelian Inheritance in Man (OMIM) and Entrez Gene
Neuronal acetylcholine receptor subunit.Definition: This gene encodes the beta 1 subunit of the acetylcholine muscle receptor. The acetylcholine receptor changes conformation upon acetylcholine binding leading to the opening of an ion-conducting channel across the plasma membrane. Mutations in this gene are associated with slow-channel congenital myasthenic syndrome. (Adapted from Entrez Gene).
